Name: Rhode Island Red
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer
Instructions: SHAKE first five ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer, lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: Tequila with a hint of berry fruit, slightly sweetened with agave nectar, spiced and made long with ginger beer.
History: Created in 2009 by Vincenzo Marianella at Copa d'Oro, Santa Monica, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Rhode Island Red contains 232 calories
